TPB isn't here to answer tech questions, did you even think about posting your question on a sports or tech forum?

Sure it is. It's whatever we make of it.

According to those in authority here, if it isn't fake, malware, passworded or the like, then itis SPECIFICALLY allowed. You can tell by the fact that it has not been removed.

Open mind, climb out of box.
